<style></style>

<template>
    <button @click="get_message()">
        获取
    </button>
</template>
<script>
import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
export default {
    mounted() {
        Cookies.set('skey', 'sCZRnCRB', { expires: 7 });
        Cookies.set('vid', '442726869', { expires: 7 });
    },
    methods: {
        get_message() {
            url = "http://localhost:5000/weread/info"
            fetch("http://localhost:5000/weread/info", {
                method: 'POST'  // 或者 POST 等其他请求方法，按需调整
            })
                .then(response => console.log(response.json()))
                .then(data => console.log(data))
                .catch(error => console.error(error));
            
        }
    }
};
</script>
